messages.title: SUPPORT GROWING FOR JOHN LEECH
messages.content: John has a visible track record for standing up for our area

messages.title: BETRAYED OVER BREXIT
messages.content: Labour voted with UKIP to trigger a damaging Brexit.

messages.title: Only one party can stop Brexit wrecking Britain - see inside

keyPolicies.policyDescription: John Leech opposed Brexit, supported Remain, and backed calls for a final say given the risks of Brexit.
John Leech advocated for proper funding for the NHS and social care.
John Leech campaigned against school budget cuts.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Theresa May, Jeremy Corbyn, Nigel Farage

issues.brexitEurope: Opposed Brexit, supported Remain, backed calls for a final say. Labour and Tories followed through with Brexit.
issues.health: Advocated for proper funding for the NHS and social care.

politicalExperience.achievements: John Leech has been re-elected multiple times and served as the Leader of the Opposition in Manchester.

images.caption: John Leech holding a sign, showing support from various demographics, and stopping Brexit.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet presents a strong stance against Brexit and criticizes Labour and the Conservatives for their role in advancing it.
